title: Master Yi Bugs? (Maybe)
body:
{{champion:11}} When i meditate for like less than a second and then move it seems like i was floating {{champion:11}}  
(Or is it fixed i dunno)

replies.body:
Yeah, but it's not really a bug. It's just the way the animations are set up. Maybe it might be fixed in a general VU for the game.

Since it doesn't actually affect gameplay, I don't think it will be touched for a long time. And for future reference, bug reports belong in the ['report a bug' board](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report), not help and support.
